he cursed Imaskari glovesNote that this pair of gloves is never referred to using this name in the book it is merely described. were a pair of gloves, an Imaskari relic unearthed from the ruins of Solon by the slaves of Ambuchar Devayam.
These gloves were golden.
When worn, they slowly constricted. Within two minutes, the wearers hands were rendered mangled, useless stumps.
